_camera_matrix_comment: 3x3 intrinsic matrix [[fx, 0, cx], [0, fy, cy], [0, 0, 1]]. fx/fy are focal lengths in pixels (~60° horizontal FOV), cx/cy is principal point (optical center)
_distortion_comment: Distortion coefficients [k1, k2, p1, p2, k3] for radial and tangential distortion. Zero for pinhole model
_rotation_vector_comment: Rodrigues rotation vector [rx, ry, rz] in radians. Represents camera orientation relative to vehicle frame. This is pitch=-10° (looking slightly down)
_translation_vector_comment: Camera position [x, y, z] in meters relative to vehicle origin (rear axle center). x=right, y=up, z=forward
